TopicTitle: Remove orbit lines option for all craft not just debris

Articles.Content:
I will admit this is an edge-case request. I want the orbit lines gone so I can assign different colored circles to each vessel type (already have this working via Asset Explorer texture swap) and create something like this:

with each color a different type of asteroid (the types come from the Custom Asteroid mod).

On the general-use side however it could be nice to help de-clutter the view sometimes when you have RemoteTech and/or just a lot of vessels creating a lot of lines to peer through

Any takers? So far this is the best I can do since I can only use Debris (I guess I could use Space Objects too but that's it right now). Would be way cooler if I had more vessel types to use for different colors/sizes

Hopefully Unity5 will have a more efficient renderer - I disabled background processing and the framerate was still choppy so it has to just be the massive amount of sprites being shown for each asteroid (there really are 1,500+ of them shown in that video)
